name: Cuppa Joe
description:
PHOTOSENSITIVITY WARNING! Stay safe out there!

Joe needs to get his morning cuppas, but he keeps going around in circles!

Press X to rotate 90 degrees and drink an increasingly higher amount of coffee before he crashes.

Oh, and watch out for horrible shmup projectiles!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

A One Button Delight from JIMCO

Update 08/04/2023: accidentally started on final level, and fixed epilepsy issue. Also, I deleted the final level due to unfair difficulty.
